scene.name: intro
scene.line: And here's the first moment you could really call it bourbon. The barrel dump.
We cut it here with water from the middle of Lake Lethe. Has to be right in the middle, at the deepest, coldest point.
They dive with sealed jugs, and only stop to fill them once they've reached total darkness.
Pageantry? Ritual? Who can say? Tradition, maybe.
